An in-depth look at select work.

1

Blue Terminal

Identity, visual language and iconographic design an energy news and research platform. Project included functionality prototyping and user interface/interaction development.

2

2

Campaign
for Culture

“Campaign for Culture” is a grassroots organization working to modernize liquor laws in British Columbia. I designed a visual language for the project, including a series of illustration, and developed their website.

3

3

Paintings
by Lori Lees-Stout

Personal identity and communication materials for an artist in Vancouver BC.
